item.title: Thoughts on taking the Kubernetes CKS and beta CKA exams in 2025
item.description: Goodness, how time flies.. two years have gone by since my last blog CKS-related post, enough time for my existing certification to expire.. so I guess it’s time to dust off the ol’ Hugo template and write about it again! I recently re-upped my Certified Kubernetes Security Specialist certification in February, and also got the opportunity to beta-test the 2025 revision of the Certified Kubernetes Administrator one as well. How have things changed for both of these since then?
